page.title: 14Fruit Farm Marketing
page.content: Unlike many other farming activities, fruit-growing does not have guaranteed prices from the E.E.C. Intervention allows 2p/lb. which makes fruit picking uneconomic. E.E.C. regulations on fruit marketing quality are strictly controlled, into Fancy Class, Group & 2. Other fruit can be sold directly from the farm but not in wholesale markets. Grades are on colour, size and shape as well as quality. Sub-standard fruit in markets is down-graded or returned. Transportation of fruit to market effects quality so this grower always transports personally,starting the day at 3.0 a.m. at times. Growers cannot demand a set price, having to take whstever the market offers.
